featured.text: They also contain a very large amount of processed coconut oil, which is even worse than lard.

definition.zh_def: 豬油，一種從豬脂肪中提煉出的脂肪，常用於烹飪和烘焙。
definition.en_def: Lard is a type of fat obtained from the rendered fat of pigs, commonly used in cooking and baking.
definition.example: She used lard to make the pie crust extra flaky.
